Layers.Name: Anywhere
Layers.Description: Widgets using this layer will display anywhere.

login_url.Hint: outputs the login url with the current url as the returnUrl

badge.Content: {{Content | raw}}

col.Hint: Renders a column. To be used inside a [row] shortcode. Please see the https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.6/layout/grid/ docs for more information about available classes. By default the col class is added

row.Hint: Renders a row. Please see the https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.6/layout/grid/ docs for available classes

container.Hint: Renders a container. Please see the https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.6/layout/overview/#containers
